docs.lead_paragraph: It’s Jim Webb, not Elizabeth Warren.

docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Jacob Heilbrunn, editor of The National Interest, argues Sen Jim Webb represents most viable threat to Hillary Clinton's prospects of receiving the Democratic nomination in the 2016 presidential election; holds that Webb's populist economic stance and longstanding opposition to endless wars abroad could make him a considerable opponent, especially given Clinton's foreign policy history.

headline.main: The Real Threat to Hillary Clinton: Jim Webb
